verses.verse: כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> The heaven כִּסְאִ֔י <S%H3678><s%> [is] my throne וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the earth הֲדֹ֣ם <S%H1916><s%> stool רַגְלָ֑י <S%H7272><s%> be able to endure אֵי־ <S%H335><s%> Where זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> then בַ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> where [is] the house אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you תִּבְנוּ־ <S%H1129><s%> that ye build לִ֔י וְאֵי־ <S%H335><s%> and where זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> then מָק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto me? and where [is] the place מְנוּחָתִֽי׃ <S%H4496><s%> comfortable וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner

אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these יָדִ֣י <S%H3027><s%> For all those [things] hath mine hand עָשָׂ֔תָה <S%H6213><s%> made וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> came כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> things נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> and all those [things] have been saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> this אַבִּ֔יט <S%H5027><s%> but to this [man] will I look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to him עָנִי֙ <S%H6041><s%> [even] to [him that is] poor וּנְכֵה־ <S%H5223><s%> and of a contrite ר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit וְחָרֵ֖ד <S%H2730><s%> and trembleth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at דְּבָרִֽי׃ <S%H1697><s%> at my word

שׁוֹחֵ֨ט <S%H7819><s%> He that killeth הַשּׁ֜וֹר <S%H7794><s%> an ox מַכֵּה־ <S%H5221><s%> [is as if] he slew אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man זוֹבֵ֤חַ <S%H2076><s%> he that sacrificeth הַשֶּׂה֙ <S%H7716><s%> a lamb עֹ֣רֵֽף <S%H6202><s%> neck כֶּ֔לֶב <S%H3611><s%> a dog's מַעֲלֵ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> he that offereth מִנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> an oblation דַּם־ <S%H1818><s%> blood חֲזִ֔יר <S%H2386><s%> [as if he offered] swine's מַזְכִּ֥יר <S%H2142><s%> he that burneth לְבֹנָ֖ה <S%H3828><s%> incense מְבָ֣רֵֽךְ <S%H1288><s%> [as if] he blessed אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> an idol גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> as they בָּֽחֲרוּ֙ <S%H977><s%> Yea they have chosen בְּדַרְכֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H1870><s%> their own ways וּבְשִׁקּוּצֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8251><s%> in their abominations נַפְשָׁ֥ם <S%H5315><s%> and their soul חָפֵֽצָה׃ <S%H2654><s%> delighteth

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> So אֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> I אֶבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> I also will choose בְּתַעֲלֻלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H8586><s%> their delusions וּמְגֽוּרֹתָם֙ <S%H4035><s%> their fears אָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> and will bring לָהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like יַ֤עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because קָרָ֙אתִי֙ <S%H7121><s%> upon them because when I called וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> no עוֹנֶ֔ה <S%H6030><s%> none did answer דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> when I spake וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמֵ֑עוּ <S%H8085><s%> they did not hear וַיַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> but they did הָרַע֙ <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינַ֔י <S%H5869><s%> before mine eyes וּבַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not חָפַ֖צְתִּי <S%H2654><s%> [that] in which I delighted בָּחָֽרוּ׃ <S%H977><s%> and chose ס

שִׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> Hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הַחֲרֵדִ֖ים <S%H2730><s%> ye that tremble אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at דְּבָר֑וֹ <S%H1697><s%> at his word אָמְרוּ֩ <S%H559><s%> sake said אֲחֵיכֶ֨ם <S%H251><s%> Your brethren שֹׂנְאֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H8130><s%> that hated מְנַדֵּיכֶ֗ם <S%H5077><s%> you that cast you out לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> sake שְׁמִי֙ <S%H8034><s%> for my name's יִכְבַּ֣ד <S%H3513><s%> be glorified יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Let the LORD וְנִרְאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> but he shall appear בְשִׂמְחַתְכֶ֖ם <S%H8057><s%> to your joy וְהֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> like יֵבֹֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H954><s%> and they shall be ashamed

ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> A voice שָׁאוֹן֙ <S%H7588><s%> of noise מֵעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> from the city ק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> a voice מֵֽהֵיכָ֑ל <S%H1964><s%> from the temple ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> a voice יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <S%H7999><s%> that rendereth גְּמ֖וּל <S%H1576><s%> recompence לְאֹיְבָֽיו׃ <S%H341><s%> to his enemies

בְּטֶ֥רֶם <S%H2962><s%> Before תָּחִ֖יל <S%H2342><s%> Before she travailed יָלָ֑דָה <S%H3205><s%> she brought forth בְּטֶ֨רֶם <S%H2962><s%> Before יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> came חֵ֛בֶל <S%H2256><s%> before her pain לָ֖הּ וְהִמְלִ֥יטָה <S%H4422><s%> she was delivered זָכָֽר׃ <S%H2145><s%> of a man child

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> Who hath heard כָּזֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who רָאָה֙ <S%H7200><s%> such a thing? who hath seen כָּאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> such הֲי֤וּחַל <S%H2342><s%> be made to bring forth אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> such things? Shall the earth בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> age אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> in one אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יִוָּ֥לֵֽד <S%H3205><s%> be born גּ֖וֹי <S%H1471><s%> Gentile פַּ֣עַם <S%H6471><s%> all אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> one כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חָ֛לָה <S%H2342><s%> travailed גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also יָלְדָ֥ה <S%H3205><s%> she brought forth צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H1121><s%> her children

הַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> shall I אַשְׁבִּ֛יר <S%H7665><s%> Shall I bring to the birth וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not אוֹלִ֖יד <S%H3205><s%> and not cause to bring forth יֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> ? saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or אֲנִ֧י <S%H589><s%> shall I הַמּוֹלִ֛יד <S%H3205><s%> cause to bring forth וְעָצַ֖רְתִּי <S%H6113><s%> and shut אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> [the womb]? saith אֱלֹהָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God ס

שִׂמְח֧וּ <S%H8055><s%> Rejoice אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> ye with Jerusalem וְגִ֥ילוּ <S%H1523><s%> and be glad בָ֖הּ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> her all אֹהֲבֶ֑יהָ <S%H157><s%> with her all ye that love שִׂ֤ישׂוּ <S%H7797><s%> her rejoice אִתָּהּ֙ <S%H854><s%> for מָשׂ֔וֹשׂ <S%H4885><s%> for joy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> her all הַמִּֽתְאַבְּלִ֖ים <S%H56><s%> with her all ye that mourn עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> over

לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תִּֽינְקוּ֙ <S%H3243><s%> That ye may suck וּשְׂבַעְתֶּ֔ם <S%H7646><s%> and be satisfied מִשֹּׁ֖ד <S%H7699><s%> with the breasts תַּנְחֻמֶ֑יהָ <S%H8575><s%> of her consolations לְמַ֧עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תָּמֹ֛צּוּ <S%H4711><s%> that ye may milk out וְהִתְעַנַּגְתֶּ֖ם <S%H6026><s%> and be delighted מִזִּ֥יז <S%H2123><s%> with the abundance כְּבוֹדָֽהּ׃ <S%H3519><s%> of her glory ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold נֹטֶֽה־ <S%H5186><s%> Behold I will extend אֵ֠לֶיהָ <S%H413><s%> to her כְּנָהָ֨ר <S%H5104><s%> to her like a river שָׁל֜וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace וּכְנַ֧חַל <S%H5158><s%> stream שׁוֹטֵ֛ף <S%H7857><s%> like a flowing כְּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and the glory גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> of the Gentiles וִֽינַקְתֶּ֑ם <S%H3243><s%> then shall ye suck עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on צַד֙ <S%H6654><s%> upon [her] sides תִּנָּשֵׂ֔אוּ <S%H5375><s%> ye shall be borne וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בִּרְכַּ֖יִם <S%H1290><s%> upon [her] knees תְּשָׁעֳשָֽׁעוּ׃ <S%H8173><s%> and be dandled

כְּאִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> As one אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom אִמּ֖וֹ <S%H517><s%> whom his mother תְּנַחֲמֶ֑נּוּ <S%H5162><s%> comforteth כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> so אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I אֲנַ֣חֶמְכֶ֔ם <S%H5162><s%> so will I comfort וּבִירֽוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem תְּנֻחָֽמוּ׃ <S%H5162><s%> you and ye shall be comforted

וּרְאִיתֶם֙ <S%H7200><s%> And when ye see וְשָׂ֣שׂ <S%H7797><s%> shall rejoice לִבְּכֶ֔ם <S%H3820><s%> [this] your heart וְעַצְמוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6106><s%> and your bones כַּדֶּ֣שֶׁא <S%H1877><s%> like an herb תִפְרַ֑חְנָה <S%H6524><s%> shall flourish וְנוֹדְעָ֤ה <S%H3045><s%> shall be known יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> and the hand יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> toward עֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> toward his servants וְזָעַ֖ם <S%H2194><s%> and [his] indignation אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <S%H341><s%> toward his enemies

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> For behold the LORD בָּאֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> will come וְכַסּוּפָ֖ה <S%H5492><s%> like a whirlwind מַרְכְּבֹתָ֑יו <S%H4818><s%> and with his chariots לְהָשִׁ֤יב <S%H7725><s%> to render בְּחֵמָה֙ <S%H2534><s%> with fury אַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> his anger וְגַעֲרָת֖וֹ <S%H1606><s%> and his rebuke בְּלַהֲבֵי־ <S%H3851><s%> with flames אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> of fire

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> by בָאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> For by fire יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> will the LORD נִשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H8199><s%> plead וּבְחַרְבּ֖וֹ <S%H2719><s%> and by his sword אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּשָׂ֑ר <S%H1320><s%> with all flesh וְרַבּ֖וּ <S%H7231><s%> shall be many חַֽלְלֵ֥י <S%H2491><s%> and the slain יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

הַמִּתְקַדְּשִׁ֨ים <S%H6942><s%> They that sanctify וְהַמִּֽטַּהֲרִ֜ים <S%H2891><s%> themselves and purify אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַגַּנּ֗וֹת <S%H1593><s%> themselves in the gardens אַחַ֤ר <S%H310><s%> behind [אֶחַד כ] (אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> a ק) בַּתָּ֔וֶךְ <S%H8432><s%> [tree] in the midst אֹֽכְלֵי֙ <S%H398><s%> eating בְּשַׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh הַחֲזִ֔יר <S%H2386><s%> swine's וְהַשֶּׁ֖קֶץ <S%H8263><s%> and the abomination וְהָעַכְבָּ֑ר <S%H5909><s%> and the mouse יַחְדָּ֥ו <S%H3162><s%> together יָסֻ֖פוּ <S%H5486><s%> shall be consumed נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD
